text: Required Reading The second edition of V olume ll of the Voyagers series has been vastly enlarged so as to include much important, current information about what is happening on Planet Earth, up to and including the tragic national events of September ll, 2001, when hijacked airliners were intentionally crashed into the World Trade Center and the Pentagon. To ensure that you have an appropriate understanding of this informa- tion, it will be necessary for you to obtain and read, if you have not done so already, the second edition of Voyagers, V olume I. See “Ordering informa- tion” on page 580. Specifically, the following bolded sections of V oyagers I, second edition, are essential to understand before proceeding: *Introduction............................................................................................................................................ix *The Azurite Temple of the Melchizedek Cloister, Inc (updated)...........................................xxxv *About the Author ...........................................................................................................................xxxvi *CDT-Plates, Emerald Covenant and the Mass Drama ...........................................................xliii *Administrative Levels of the Emerald Order Melchizedek Cloister........................................xlix The Yunasai............................
